description: Your new favorite shorts – on or off belay – the versatile, durable, comfortable Konseal is made to climb. The fabric combines organically grown cotton’s natural comfort, nylon’s quick-dry durability, and elastane’s stretch. A gusseted crotch adds freedom of movement, the pull-on waistband fits comfortably under your harness, and the four pockets are harness compatible.
name: Arcteryx Konseal Shorts, 7" Inseam - Mens
